name: gcs-dev
body:
#Welcome to **gcs-dev**!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of _Die Griechischen Christlichen Schriftsteller_ (GCS) by Adolf Harnack and Theodor Mommsen.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/) (DDD), who corrected and encoded hOCR output generated by [Bruce Robertson](https://github.com/brobertson) in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards.
While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

Find little more information about GCS [on Wikipedia](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Die_Griechischen_Christlichen_Schriftsteller).

#Volumes

##Epiphanius
* _[Ancoratus und Panarion, Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/epiphanius_1915_ancoratus_panarion_vol1.xml)_ (1915) ed. Karl Holl. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
* _[Panarion, Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/epiphanius_1922_panarion_vol2.xml)_ (1922) ed. Karl Holl. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
